meanings.sent1: The unsoaked towel quickly absorbed the spilled water.
meanings.sent2: The clothes were unsoaked after being left out in the sun to dry.
meanings.sent3: The unsoaked sponge refused to clean up the mess, playing hard to get.
meanings.sent4: Her unsoaked hair stood out in the rain like a beacon of dryness.
meanings.sent5: The unsoaked wood soaked up the paint like a thirsty desert.

meanings.sent1: The unsoaked ground cracked under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: The unsoaked paper remained crisp and easy to write on.
meanings.sent3: The unsoaked plant seemed to mock the rain, standing tall and dry.
meanings.sent4: His unsoaked enthusiasm for the project was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The unsoaked sponge sat idly by, refusing to absorb a drop of water.
